attributes.action: petition to get the birthing scene OFF "knocked up"
attributes.additional_details: As a man watching a comedy is only normal but NEVER did I begin to understand what this movie has done to be once promonate sex life. It has been 2 months since I have watched that horrible movie. An image of a women's vaginia while giving birth as forever affected my ability to get an erriction. Please sign this petition to get a public and personal apology from the makers of this disgusting movie.
